item.title: OpenAI makes ChatGPT’s image generation available as API
item.description: Enterprises can now make Studio Ghibli-inspired images through OpenAI's API.

item.title: From friction to flow: Why Swissport scrapped its VPN maze for Cato’s SASE fabric
item.description: Swissport ditches legacy tech, deploying a global, Zero Trust SASE architecture with Cato Networks securing 26,000 users, unlocking real-time control.

item.title: More accurate coding: Researchers adapt Sequential Monte Carlo for AI-generated code
item.description: Researchers from MIT, Yale, McGill University and others found that adapting the Sequential Monte Carlo algorithm can make AI-generated code better.
